item.title: Joker 2’s Box Office Numbers Are Beaten By 10 Infamous DC Movies
item.description: Joker: Folie à Deux suffered a lot of controversy, but many just-as-controversial DC movies managed to gross more at the global box office.

item.title: Alien (1979) Ending Explained: What Happens To Ripley & The Xenomorph
item.description: Ridley Scott's 1979 masterpiece Alien had a somewhat confusing and symbolically significant ending, and it could still use some explaining today.

item.title: 10 Best Kraven The Hunter Quotes
item.description: Kraven the Hunter brought the iconic Spider-Man villain to life as part of the SSU, proffering some memorable dialogue that reflects central themes.
